title: Hobbs Goblin in The Treasure Adventure
description: Follow Hobbs Goblin on an adventure to find buried pirate treasure! Hobbs Goblin engages with the reader in this short story making you and your child a tag-along adventurer! With treasure map in hand, you and Hobbs Goblin travel through the forest only to be confronted by the great forest beast, Skwee. Will you and Hobbs escape and find the buried treasure
author: Joseph  Foster
